title: CRITICAL: Replace deprecated google-generativeai with google-genai
description:
URGENT: google-generativeai reached EOL on November 30, 2025. Must migrate to google-genai package immediately.

Actions:
1. Update pyproject.toml: google-generativeai>=0.3.0 → google-genai>=1.0.0
2. Update code imports: from google.generativeai → from google.genai
3. Update gemini_client.py with new API
4. Test Gemini integration thoroughly
5. Update all 3 agents if using Gemini

Files affected:
- agents/test-cases-agent/pyproject.toml
- agents/test-cases-agent/src/test_cases_agent/llm/gemini_client.py

Risk: HIGH - API redesign, requires code changes
Effort: 2-4 hours
Testing: Full LLM integration tests required
close_reason: Resolved: Removed all dead Gemini/OpenAI code. google-generativeai was never implemented - only referenced in dead code. Agent now exclusively uses Anthropic Claude.

comments.author: zohaibtanwir
comments.text:
⚠️ CODE CHANGES REQUIRED:

Found imports in agents/test-cases-agent/src/test_cases_agent/llm/gemini_client.py:
- Line 6: import google.generativeai as genai
- Line 7: from google.generativeai.types import GenerationConfig as GeminiConfig

NEW API (google-genai) is completely different:
- Old: google.generativeai
- New: google.genai

RECOMMENDATION: Since test-cases-agent is being simplified to Anthropic-only (issue qa-platform-gpp), consider removing Gemini support entirely instead of migrating to new API.

DECISION NEEDED: 
1. Remove Gemini client entirely (recommended for Anthropic-only strategy)
2. Migrate to new google-genai API (requires 2-4 hours of work)

Current status: pyproject.toml updated to google-genai>=1.0.0, but code still uses old API.

Current: react@^18, react-dom@^18
Target: react@18.3.1, react-dom@18.3.1

Why 18.3.1 first:
- Adds deprecation warnings for React 19
- Identifies issues before major upgrade
- Recommended migration path

1. cd agents/test-data-agent/ui && npm install react@18.3.1 react-dom@18.3.1
2. cd agents/ecommerce-domain-agent/ui && npm install react@18.3.1 react-dom@18.3.1

title: Test Cases History: Update proto definitions with history messages and RPCs
Add missing enum definitions to test_cases.proto
description: Added TestType enums (INTEGRATION, UNIT, USABILITY, REGRESSION, SMOKE, ACCEPTANCE, COMPATIBILITY, ACCESSIBILITY, LOCALIZATION, API, DATABASE, LOAD, STRESS, RECOVERY), Priority enum, TestCaseStatus enum, and HealthCheckStatus enum to proto definition
close_reason: Proto enum definitions added and tested successfully

comments.author: zohaibtanwir
comments.text:
IMPLEMENTATION COMPLETE:

Added comprehensive enum definitions to protos/test_cases.proto:

## TestType Enum Extensions (lines 117-134)
Added 14 new test types:
- INTEGRATION (7): Integration between components
- UNIT (8): Unit level tests
- USABILITY (9): Usability and UX tests
- REGRESSION (10): Regression tests
- SMOKE (11): Smoke tests
- ACCEPTANCE (12): Acceptance tests
- COMPATIBILITY (13): Compatibility tests
- ACCESSIBILITY (14): Accessibility tests
- LOCALIZATION (15): Localization tests
- API (16): API tests
- DATABASE (17): Database tests
- LOAD (18): Load tests
- STRESS (19): Stress tests
- RECOVERY (20): Recovery tests

## Priority Enum (lines 137-143)
- PRIORITY_UNSPECIFIED (0)
- CRITICAL (1): Must be tested, blocks release
- HIGH (2): Important, should be tested
- MEDIUM (3): Standard priority  
- LOW (4): Nice to have

## TestCaseStatus Enum (lines 146-155)
- TEST_CASE_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED (0)
- DRAFT (1): Test case is being created
- READY (2): Ready for execution
- IN_PROGRESS (3): Currently being executed
- PASSED (4): Test passed
- FAILED (5): Test failed
- BLOCKED (6): Test is blocked
- SKIPPED (7): Test was skipped

## HealthCheckStatus Enum (lines 322-327)
- HEALTH_CHECK_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED (0)
- SERVING (1): Service is healthy and serving
- NOT_SERVING (2): Service is not serving
- SERVICE_UNKNOWN (3): Service status unknown

## Additional Proto Changes
- Changed priority field from string to Priority enum in TestCase (line 177)
- Added status field to TestCase (line 200)
- Added count, include_edge_cases, include_negative_tests, detail_level to GenerationConfig (lines 86-89)
- Changed error to error_message in GenerateTestCasesResponse (line 169)
- Changed requirement to FreeFormInput (line 60)

All changes tested and proto regenerated successfully.

title: EPIC: Upgrade all dependencies to latest stable versions (Dec 2025)
description:
Master epic tracking all dependency upgrades across the QA Platform.

CRITICAL FINDINGS:
- google-generativeai DEPRECATED (EOL Nov 30, 2025)
- 16+ dependencies significantly outdated
- Security and performance improvements available

PHASES:
Phase 1 - CRITICAL (P1):
- qa-platform-10y: Replace google-generativeai with google-genai
- qa-platform-mzj: Update Python to 3.13
- qa-platform-2p8: Upgrade gRPC to 1.76.0

Phase 2 - SAFE UPGRADES (P2):
- qa-platform-78y: Pydantic 2.12.5
- qa-platform-18u: Weaviate 4.18.3
- qa-platform-a5g: FastAPI/uvicorn
- qa-platform-7kw: structlog 25.5.0

Phase 3 - BREAKING CHANGES (P2):
- qa-platform-m7x: Anthropic 0.75.0
- qa-platform-cxo: OpenAI 2.14.0

Phase 4 - DEV TOOLS (P3):
- qa-platform-k50: pytest 9.0.2
- qa-platform-vlo: black/ruff/mypy

Phase 5 - UI UPGRADES (P2-P3):
- qa-platform-42h: React 18.3.1
- qa-platform-vz5: Next.js 15
- qa-platform-ove: React 19
- qa-platform-k9f: Next.js 16
- qa-platform-dxo: Other UI deps

ESTIMATED TOTAL EFFORT: 25-35 hours
TARGET COMPLETION: 2 weeks
close_reason: Closed

description:

Current versions:
- test-cases-agent: pytest>=7.4.0 (2 major versions behind)
- test-data-agent: pytest>=8.0.0 (1 major version behind)
- ecommerce-domain-agent: pytest>=8.0.0

Also upgrade:
- pytest-asyncio>=0.24.0
- pytest-cov>=6.0.0
- pytest-mock>=3.14.0

Benefits:
- Better test output
- Performance improvements
- New features

Actions:
1. Review pytest 9.0 changelog for breaking changes
2. Update all pyproject.toml dev dependencies
3. Update pytest config if needed
4. Run full test suite

Current: react@18.3.1 (after previous upgrade)
Target: react@19.2.3, react-dom@19.2.3

Benefits:
- Server Components stable
- New hooks
- Performance improvements
- React Compiler support

Actions:
1. Review React 19 migration guide
2. Verify all deprecation warnings fixed in 18.3.1
3. npm install react@latest react-dom@latest
4. Update code for breaking changes
5. Test all components
6. Run full test suite

Breaking changes:
- Deprecated APIs removed
- Ref handling changes
- Suspense behavior updates

Risk: HIGH - Major version upgrade
Effort: 4-6 hours
Testing: Comprehensive UI regression tests

Dependencies: 
- Requires React 18.3.1 first (qa-platform-xxx)
- Should be done after Next.js 15 (qa-platform-xxx)

title: Test Cases History: Create Zustand store for test cases state management
Fix proto field name mismatch in test-cases-agent service
close_reason: Proto field name mismatches fixed and tested successfully

comments.author: zohaibtanwir
comments.text:
Fixed proto field name mismatches in service.py:
- Line 357: Changed story_text -> story (UserStoryInput.story)
- Line 358: Changed entity_type to hardcoded 'user_story'
- Lines 363-368: Updated ApiSpecInput to use spec, spec_format, endpoints fields
- Added additional_context handling for UserStoryInput
- Service successfully tested with user story grpcurl command
- No more AttributeError on proto field access

comments.author: zohaibtanwir
comments.text:
COMPLETE IMPLEMENTATION PLAN:

## Problem Statement
AttributeError: story_text on line 357 of service.py
Proto field names in service.py did not match proto definitions in test_cases.proto

## Root Cause Analysis
Service code was accessing non-existent proto fields:
- UserStoryInput.story_text (should be .story)
- UserStoryInput.entity_type (field doesn't exist)
- ApiSpecInput.endpoint, .method, .parameters (should be .spec, .spec_format, .endpoints)

## Implementation Steps Completed

### 1. Code Changes (service.py:350-373)
File: agents/test-cases-agent/src/test_cases_agent/server/service.py

Line 357: 
  BEFORE: requirement = proto_request.user_story.story_text
  AFTER:  requirement = proto_request.user_story.story

Line 358:
  BEFORE: entity_type = proto_request.user_story.entity_type or "general"
  AFTER:  entity_type = "user_story"

Lines 360-361: Added additional_context handling
  NEW: if proto_request.user_story.additional_context:
           domain_context["additional_context"] = proto_request.user_story.additional_context

Lines 363-368: Fixed ApiSpecInput field references
  BEFORE: endpoint, method, parameters
  AFTER:  spec, spec_format, endpoints

### 2. Documentation Updates (AGENTS.md)
File: AGENTS.md

Added new section "Implementation Task Planning" (lines 47-93)
- Documented requirement to use bd commands for all implementation tasks
- Added examples: bd create, bd start, bd comment, bd close
- Added examples for syncing: bd sync, git commit, git push

### 3. Testing & Verification
- Service restarted successfully on ports 9003 (gRPC) and 8083 (HTTP)
- Tested with user story grpcurl command
- Generated 7 test cases in 64.6 seconds
- No AttributeError - proto field access working correctly
- Anthropic Claude API integration confirmed working (HTTP 200 OK)

### 4. Git Commit
Commit: ae59d36
Message: Fix proto field name mismatches in test-cases-agent
Files: 2 changed, 75 insertions(+), 31 deletions(-)

## Files Modified
1. agents/test-cases-agent/src/test_cases_agent/server/service.py
2. AGENTS.md

## Proto References (Source of Truth)
protos/test_cases.proto:
- UserStoryInput (lines 47-51): story, acceptance_criteria, additional_context
- ApiSpecInput (lines 53-57): spec, spec_format, endpoints
- FreeFormInput (lines 59-62): requirement, context

## Testing Commands Used
```bash
# Start service
cd /Users/zohaibtanwir/projects/qa-platform/agents/test-cases-agent
PYTHONPATH=./src python -m test_cases_agent.main

# Test with user story
grpcurl -plaintext -d '{
  "request_id": "test-user-story-001",
  "user_story": {
    "story": "As a user, I want to login...",
    "acceptance_criteria": [...],
    "additional_context": "Web application using React"
  },
  "generation_config": {...}
}' localhost:9003 testcases.v1.TestCasesService/GenerateTestCases
```

## Resolution
✅ All proto field name mismatches resolved
✅ Service running and tested successfully
✅ Documentation updated with bd workflow requirements
✅ Changes committed to git (local repository)

- black: 23.12.0/24.0.0 → 24.12.0

Effort: 2-3 hours

notes: Mock data fallback implemented in ecommerceClient with comprehensive test data

title: Phase 6.1: End-to-end testing with real backend
description: Test all eCommerce UI features with live backend service. Verify gRPC-Web communication, entity browsing, knowledge search, test data generation.
close_reason: E2E testing completed: Fixed eCommerce agent, verified gRPC-Web via Envoy, LLM integration working

title: Phase 1.2: Create ecommerceClient gRPC-Web client
description: Create gRPC-Web client in lib/grpc/ecommerceClient.ts with methods: getDomainContext, queryKnowledge, getEntity, getWorkflow, listEntities, listWorkflows, getEdgeCases, generateTestData, healthCheck

title: Phase 6.2: Fix any integration issues
description: Address any issues found during integration testing. Ensure proper error handling and edge cases.
close_reason: Fixed issues: Updated grpc_server.py to use real entity/workflow data from domain definitions. Restarted Envoy to add eCommerce route. All services healthy.

title: Phase 1.3: Update Envoy proxy config for eCommerce service
description: Add route for /ecommerce.domain.v1.EcommerceDomainService to cluster ecommerce_domain_service on port 9002

title: Phase 2.1: Create Zustand stores for eCommerce Agent
description: Create stores: ecommerce-store.ts (entities, workflows, knowledge, generation state, UI state). Similar to test-data-store.
notes: Created Zustand store with full state management for entities, workflows, knowledge, generation, and history

title: Phase 2.2: Create /ecommerce page route
description: Create app/ecommerce/page.tsx as main entry point for eCommerce Domain Agent.
notes: Created /ecommerce page route with sidebar navigation and view rendering

title: Phase 2.3: Create eCommerce layout and sidebar
description: Create EcommerceLayout with 3-column design (sidebar, main, preview) and EcommerceSidebar with navigation to Dashboard, Entities, Workflows, Knowledge, Generate.
notes: Created EcommerceSidebar, EcommerceDashboard, EntitiesView, WorkflowsView, KnowledgeView, and GenerateView components with Macy's theme

title: Phase 3.1: Create Dashboard page component
description: Dashboard with health status, feature cards (Entities, Workflows, Generate, Knowledge), quick actions, and statistics.
notes: Created EcommerceDashboard with stats, feature cards, quick actions, and recent generations

title: Phase 3.2: Create Entities Browser page
description: Entity list with category filter (Shopping, Orders, Payments, Inventory, Customer, Shipping, etc.), entity cards with stats (fields, relationships, rules, edge cases).
notes: Created EntitiesView with category filter and entity list

title: Phase 3.3: Create Entity Detail page
description: Entity detail view with fields, relationships, business rules, edge cases, test scenarios. Add Generate Data button integration.
notes: Entity details panel integrated in EntitiesView with fields, relationships, rules, edge cases, and test scenarios

title: Upgrade Next.js to 15.x (incremental upgrade)
description:
Incremental upgrade: Next.js 14.2.35 → 15.x

Current: next@14.2.35
Target: next@15.latest (before jumping to 16)

Benefits:
- Preparation for Next.js 16
- Bug fixes
- Performance improvements

Actions:
1. Review Next.js 15 upgrade guide
2. npm install next@15 react@18.3.1 react-dom@18.3.1
3. Update next.config.js if needed
4. Fix any breaking changes
5. Test dev and production builds
6. Run E2E tests

UIs affected:
- test-data-agent/ui  
- ecommerce-domain-agent/ui

Risk: MEDIUM - Minor version but may have changes
Effort: 2-3 hours
Testing: Full UI + build tests

Dependencies: Requires React 18.3.1 upgrade first
close_reason: Completed: Upgraded Next.js to 15.5.9

comments.author: zohaibtanwir
comments.text: ⚠️ DEPENDENCY: This issue depends on qa-platform-42h (React 18.3.1 upgrade) being completed first.

title: Test Cases History: Implement gRPC history endpoints in server
